title: Gold 3 with 20 LP demoted  to Gold 4 with 75 LP?
body: I was playing a ranked game, after i lost the game, i was waiting at the loading screen after the game but I decided to skipped it so that I can play an another ranked. But something weird happened. I clicked the play button but nothing happened. I kept pressing until i got a demoted screen from gold 3 to gold 4. I was like no way I got demoted since i got 20 LP in gold 3. Also my team, which I dont know them, lost so much league point in one game. Lost like 45 lp... Is there anything I can do to report it to riot?

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems the following happened: You were promoted to Gold III, you played through your 3 games under temporary shield (prevention from demotion), then eventually dropped below 0 LP. At this point, the system placed you in the right division based on your MMR (matchmaking rating) and the most recent matches you played. For complete details, check out our [Ranked Play FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Can you take a look at my account and tell me why i demoted, im pretty sure i had 18lp after a loss and after another loss i was demoted.

When you hit 0LP I know the temporary shield, however I went straight to gold 4 without the shield you mentioned. And I was stated about the play button didn't let me in the lobby, that is when the message of demotion happened... Not sure this is clear enough for you but I am positive that with 20LP I would lose like 19LP or less but I lost like 45LP. Could this be a bug or something?
